abilities.name: North Wind
info: Every 10 seconds, a gust of North Wind buffets all enemies, inflicting a -10% Defense Debuff on them. (Max Stacks: 10)
If an enemy has Frostbite Debuff, the North Wind deals an additional 100% damage to that enemy.

abilities.name: Frostbite
info: Elsa casts a Frostbite Aura on her target's position, which stays in place for 5 seconds. The target is inflicted with a Frostbite Debuff until the end of the encounter.
Enemies that enter the Frostbite Aura are Rooted and inflicted with Freeze damage, dealing 20% damage per second for as long as they remain inside the Frostbite Aura.

abilities.name: Solid Resolve
info: Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second. While inside the Frostbite Aura, Elsa gains an additional 100% Attack.
Elsa Resists 25% of all damage while inside the Frostbite Aura.

talents.name: Ice Spirals
talents.info: Grants +20% Focus at the start of an encounter. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Black Ice
talents.info: Grants +20% Attack at the start of an encounter. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Frostlock
talents.info: Any Enemy inside the Frostbite Aura has a 100% chance to be inflicted with a -20% Attack Debuff. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Frostburn
talents.info: Any Enemy inside the Frostbite Aura has a 100% chance to be inflicted with a -20% Defense Debuff. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Pack Ice
talents.info: North Wind has a 100% chance to inflict Freeze on all enemies with a Frostbite Debuff. This Freeze deals 50% damage per second for 4 seconds. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.

talents.name: Flurries
talents.info: Elsa's Frostbite Aura now deals an additional 30% damage. Elsa's Frostbite Aura duration is increased by 1 second.
